text: keat( sa leh) ban pol tha ao krom robsakhnhom. puok anak brab khnhom mk brasenbae khnhom mean phosdo tang yeang chbasaleasa ampi mcheasa robsakhnhom haey trong ban bratan dl khnhom nouv kdei me tda krounea( pheap chea)pi trong noh tae mean anaknea ach chuoy khnhom ban pi( tondakamm) a l laoh brasenbae khnhom minban korp champoh trong? puok anak min bangkeun avei dl khnhom krawpi pheap khatabng noh laey
